page.title: 12SOCIAL LIFE IN OUR AREA
page.content: Many things go on in our villages. They are run by the village hall committees in each village. The Friends and Parents Association at Stoke Ash School also runs many events. Every year on Wickham Skeith green there is a fete. There are lots of activities going on including a raft race,a band,pony rides, inflatables,fancy dress and side stalls. These are some of the activities for young people: disco,youth club,playgoup,bingo, Christmas party, barbecue, jumble sale, treasure hunt and Sunday School. And these are for adults: keepfit,meetings,flower show,fete jumble sale,harvest horkey,womans club and knit in.
